sentences.sContent: Most postdoctoral work is funded by the research councils.
sentences.sCn: 大部分的博士后的工作都是由研究会资助的。

sentences.sContent: ...What was recommended for Ph.D.s and postdoctoral researchers...
...the US Federation of American Societies for Experimental Biology recommended that every postdoctoral researcher put together an IDP in consultation with an adviser...

trans.tranOther: A postdoctoral student has completed his or her doctorate and is doing further study or research
